price: ពេលនោះការរញ្ជួយដីបានឆក់យកជីវិតពួកគេ និងធ្វើឱ្យ ពួកគេស្លាប់នៅក្នុងផ្ទះរបស់ពួកគេ។
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
